short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a GPT PopBox to any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of AI assistance in your browser with PopboxGPT, the innovative and powerful GPT Chrome extension. Designed to provide on-demand support and streamline your daily tasks, PopboxGPT makes your online experience more productive and efficient.

Key Features:

- Instant AI Assistance: Press Alt+J to access the AI assistant instantly, making AI-powered support readily available across all websites.
- Embedded Modal: Enjoy a non-intrusive, compact AI assistant that integrates seamlessly with your browsing experience.
- Full-screen Mode: Press Alt+K for an immersive, full-screen view of the AI assistant, providing an uninterrupted user experience.
- Long-term Session History: Keep track of your interactions and progress with PopboxGPT's long-term session history, ensuring continuity across multiple sessions.
- Simple and Easy: Benefit from a user-friendly interface and intuitive features designed to make AI assistance accessible and efficient for everyone.

PopboxGPT offers seamless integration with Chrome, allowing you to access the power of GPT technology without the need for external applications or complicated setups. With real-time text suggestions, context-aware search assistance, and personalized content recommendations, PopboxGPT helps you tackle complex tasks and save valuable time.

Whether you're drafting emails, conducting research, or brainstorming ideas, our intelligent Chrome extension is designed to support you every step of the way. 

Install PopboxGPT today and experience the convenience and efficiency of AI-powered assistance in your browser.
